heading: # Sheets
headingText: The `v-sheet` is designed to power other **paper** components within Vuetify. It is meant to be used as a low level component.

usage.desc: The `v-sheet` component is a malleable piece of paper that can be morphed to facilitate other components.

elevation.heading: ### Using elevation
elevation.desc: Sheets can accept a custom elevation between **0 and 24** (0 is default).

tile.heading: ### Tile
tile.desc: Sheets can accept a `tile` property which makes them rectangular (no `border-radius`).

colors-sizes.heading: ### Colors & sizes
colors-sizes.desc: Sheets and components based on them can have different sizes and colors.

props.tag: Specify a custom tag used on the root element.
